original_title: Michael Jackson: The Life and Times of the King of Pop
overview: Celebrate Michael Jackson's life, music and legacy with this program that captures his last days and the Los Angeles memorial service honoring him after his 2009 death. Numerous luminaries appear at the service to pay tribute to the King of Pop. These include Usher, Janet Jackson, Jermaine Jackson, The Jacksons, Berry Gordy, Brooke Shields, Magic Johnson, Rev. Al Sharpton, Stevie Wonder and Lionel Richie.
title: Michael Jackson: The Life and Times of the King of Pop
